metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0221 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The SSI printenv command in Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.0.17, 8.5.0 to 8.5.39 and 7.0.0 to 7.0.93 echoes user provided data without escaping and is, therefore, vulnerable to XSS. SSI is disabled by default. The printenv command is intended for debugging and is unlikely to be present in a production website.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> from upstream advisory: "The printenv command is intended for" "debugging and is unlikely to be present in a production" "website."

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.16-4').
